import React,{useState} from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faLaptopCode, faHands, faSmile, faTrophy, faDownload, faIdCardAlt, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import "./About.css"; function About() { var [valueScroll,setScrollValue] = useState(0); window.onscroll = function(){ScrollIndicator()}; function ScrollIndicator() { var winScroll = document.body.scrollTop || document.documentElement.scrollTop; var height = document.documentElement.scrollHeight - document.documentElement.clientHeight; var scrolled = (winScroll / height) * 100; setScrollValue(scrolled); // document.getElementById("myBar").style.width = scrolled + "%"; } function getAge() { var timeNow = new Date(); var age = timeNow.getFullYear() - 1999; return age; } function toStringWidthScroll(value){ return value.toString()+"%"; } console.log(toStringWidthScroll(valueScroll)); return (
